author: mratsim
content: The WebAssembly working group wants to finalize SIMD instructions, I don't think we use much beyond SHA256 on 2/4 ints at once do we? https://github.com/WebAssembly/simd/issues/343

author: holiman
content: <@551157969367334912> if you shut the node down, you can extract the entire state (with or without code) as jsonl output. See  'geth dump -h'. It's better than rpc when working with huge data, since it doesn't amass 5Gb of data in the pipeline before sending (or trying to) over rpc
